channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: Bengal Bandh Called By BJP Ove
item.description: Bengal Bandh Called By BJP Over ‘Nabanna Abhijan’ Clashes; Bus Services Affected In State #BJP #WestBengal #TNShorts

item.title: West Bengal LoP Suvendu Adhika
item.description: West Bengal LoP Suvendu Adhikari joins BJP's protest, call for 12-hour 'Bengal Bandh'. 12-hour 'Bengal Bandh' has been called by the BJP to protest against the state government after the police used lathi charge and tear gas on protestors during Nabanna Abhiyan, yesterday #WestBengal #BengalBandh #News VC - ANI

item.title: Delhi L-G's editorial in Engli
item.description: Delhi L-G's editorial in English daily Delhi L-G VK Saxena has alleged lapses in the working of the Delhi govt, including health, roads, and drainage...He has also highlighted how people have faced problems amid all this...: TIMES NOW's Tejshree Purandare reports. #DelhiLG #News #TimesNow #TimesNowNews
